name: Tower Siege (WeAreChemicalToilet)
description:
Hey guys,

This is a prototype for an idea I'm testing out.  It's inspired by the XGen flash game Defend Your Castle, where you click and throw enemies to prevent them from destroying your tower.  The object of the game is simple, prevent the enemies from getting inside the window at the top of the tower.  You can do this by clicking on an enemy and throwing them to the top of the screen.  Every kill earns gold which you can spend on defenders to help protect the tower.  Simply click on the menu and place somewhere on the green grass.  Once placed, you can pick up and place wherever you want on the screen.  As of right now, there are only 10 waves, see how long you can last!  

Like I said earlier, this is a prototype so I'm sure it's littered with bugs I haven't come across.  I'd would also love to hear your feedback on how it feels and plays.  Let me know in the comments with what works or doesn't work,   or if you think it just sucks.  Please send any bugs and feedback in the  comments or email me at wearechemicaltoilet@gmail.com

Thanks and enjoy!
